item.title: My first script w00t
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=“Hax4uremom, post:1, topic:34652”]this is my first script it is an auto ban yourself!!!

i made this as my first for 2 reasons:

a. its simple for a first
b.its a fun script!

well here it is.

[scar]//THE OFFICIAL FIRST CRIMSON KNIGHTS AUTO BAN URESELF\
//Created by Edvinfalls10\
//all credit goes to him\

program Banning;

const
message1=‘jagex sAwkcs ballz!’;

message2=‘report me bizatches!!!@@@@@@@!’;

message3=‘Im a jagex mod ohh im special!!!’;

message4=‘Wats ure pass i wont hack you?!?!?!’;

message5=‘go to wwww.gold4rs.ciom to buy runescape gold cheap!’;

message6=‘Im gunno scam you all you lil noobs’;

message7=‘F’;

message8=‘U’;

message9=‘C’;

message10=‘K’;

message11=‘Jagex’;

message12=‘And your mother you little retards!!!@@@@@@@@@@@#@#$#$%’;

procedure ban;
begin
wait(5000);
Writeln(message1);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message2);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message3);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message4);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message5);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message6);
wait(5000);
Writeln(message7);
wait(1000);
Writeln(message8);
wait(1000);
Writeln(message9);
wait(1000);
Writeln(message10);
wait(4000);
Writeln(message11);
wait(4000);
Writeln(message12);
end;

begin
repeat
ban;
until(false)

end.[/scar]

please post ways to improve and how fast you got banned comments appreciated![/quote]

This doesn’t actually send the keys to RuneScape, it just writes them in your debug window.

Instead of writeln, use sendkeys(message + chr(13));

I’ve rewritten it for you:

[scar]
//THE OFFICIAL FIRST CRIMSON KNIGHTS AUTO BAN URESELF\
//Created by Edvinfalls10\
//all credit goes to him\
//Edited by Aftermath_96\

program Banning;

const
message1=‘jagex sAwkcs ballz!’;
message2=‘report me bizatches!!!@@@@@@@!’;
message3=‘Im a jagex mod ohh im special!!!’;
message4=‘Wats ure pass i wont hack you?!?!?!’;
message5=‘go to wwww.gold4rs.ciom to buy runescape gold cheap!’;
message6=‘Im gunno scam you all you lil noobs’;
message7=‘F’;
message8=‘U’;
message9=‘C’;
message10=‘K’;
message11=‘Jagex’;
message12=‘And your mother you little retards!!!@@@@@@@@@@@#@#$#$%’;

procedure typekeys(themessage:String; waittime:integer);
begin
sendKeys(themessage + chr(13));
wait(waittime);
end;

procedure ban;
begin
typekeys(message1, 5000);
typekeys(message2, 5000);
typekeys(message3, 5000);
typekeys(message4, 5000);
typekeys(message5, 5000);
typekeys(message6, 5000);
typekeys(message7, 1000);
typekeys(message8, 1000);
typekeys(message9, 1000);
typekeys(message10, 4000);
typekeys(message11, 4000);
typekeys(message12, 4000);
end;

begin
repeat
ban;
until(false)
end.
[/scar]

I added a typewait procedure to type keys and wait, to reduce repetition a bit. When you learn a bit more, use arrays for the messages and the waittimes, and then use a for loop to do it. This wa, you’d be able to do this in less than 10 lines.

Cheers.

By the way, if you’re just going to repeat ban over and over, you can add a line that says ban; at the end of the ban procedure and take out the repeat loop.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script w00t
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

junkj:

Dont use Sendkeys Either.

Not for this script, if you did read. It tries to ban you, so you must use Sendkeys to get banned more fast.
But yes, Writeln(‘blah blah’) writes to debug box, so you might fix that.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script w00t
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Dont use Sendkeys Either.
If you have Srl put
program blah;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

Then put
Typesend instead of Writeln.

Typesend=types words like a person would…
Writeln=almost like a progress report, it puts in the Debug box.

Then At the end, after the begin put…

ActivateClient; — Automaticly goes to the RS window that you put the crosshair on.
ClearDebug; — Clears The Debug box.
SetUpSrl; — Sets up srl

Hope i helped

Read full topic

@hey321 wrote:

Good job for a first try, only problem is it doesnt work with rs ;). Instead of using WriteLn use SendKeys, its VERY detectable and it well send it to rs and types REALLY fast.

@Hax4uremom wrote:

this is my first script it is an auto ban yourself!!!

a. its simple for a first
b.its a fun script!

well here it is.

[scar]//THE OFFICIAL FIRST CRIMSON KNIGHTS AUTO BAN URESELF\

program Banning;

message8=‘U’;

message9=‘C’;

message10=‘K’;

message11=‘Jagex’;

Writeln(message2);

Writeln(message5);

Writeln(message6);

Writeln(message7);
